name: webext-bot
description: An open-source Github Bot to report extension size change and extension version change on pull requests.
author: Amit Singh <amitsingh5198@gmail.com>

scripts.build: pnpm typecheck && pnpm clean && pnpm build:bundle
scripts.build:bundle: ncc build src/app.ts -o dist/app --source-map --minify --target es2022 --license licenses.txt
scripts.simulate:issues.opened: pnpm dist && GITHUB_EVENT_NAME=issues GITHUB_EVENT_PATH=./test/fixtures/issues.opened.json pnpm exec probot receive ./dist/app/index.js
scripts.simulate:pull_request.opened: pnpm dist && GITHUB_EVENT_NAME=pull_request GITHUB_EVENT_PATH=./test/fixtures/pull_request.opened.json pnpm exec probot receive ./dist/app/index.js
scripts.simulate:pull_request.synchronize: pnpm dist && GITHUB_EVENT_NAME=pull_request GITHUB_EVENT_PATH=./test/fixtures/pull_request.synchronize.json pnpm exec probot receive ./dist/app/index.js
scripts.simulate:workflow_run.completed: pnpm dist && GITHUB_EVENT_NAME=workflow_run GITHUB_EVENT_PATH=./test/fixtures/workflow_run.completed.json pnpm exec probot receive ./dist/app/index.js
